= Middleware
:url-docs: https://nuxt.com/docs/guide/directory-structure/middleware

{url-docs}[[docs\]]

https://github.com/nuxt/nuxt/discussions/25061[Nuxt Global Middleware #25061]

[,https://www.the-koi.com/projects/nuxt3-middlewares-everything-you-need-to-know/]
____
Within nuxt there are two types of middlewares. 

The *route middleware* executed in the *vue* part of your application.

The normal middleware executed in the *nitro* part of the application.
____
